channel.title: Redstone circuits and pistons missing
channel.description:
I logged in and tried to open a piston door, it didn't work, so i went to see the wiring and the pistons and almost all repeaters where gone, then i look around the other sectors and rooms with pistons and the same. bb log says there where no edits on that blocks, and some pistons were added a month ago so there's no posibilites that someone in masturcity got rolledback. i already asked all the people that live there (irl friends) and no one knows anything.
any ideas of wtf is going on?
when i logged and repaired one door, like two hours later i logged in again and the pistons where gone. maybe and enderman is trolling xD
Edit: i've repaired the stuff, but something weird is going on the server

item.title: Redstone circuits and pistons missing

duped iron blocks
but wasted all my slime balls repairing…
[/quote]

ill sell u some for wool i got about 27 that i can sell[/quote]

deal, how much wool you want?
